Paragraph: The CV curves were recorded referenced to an Ag / Ag þ electrode , which was calibrated against the ferroceneferrocenium ( Fc / Fc þ ) redox couple ( 4.8 eV below the vacuum level ) ; the CV curves are shown in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| ferroceneferrocenium (Fc / Fc þ ) |

| --- |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material Name":

* "which" (this is a pronoun referring to a previous noun, not a material name)
* "the" (this is a definite article, not a material name)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
